newsitem.title: USA: KANSAS FED CATTLE FRIDAY ROUNDUP - USDA.
newsitem.headline: KANSAS FED CATTLE FRIDAY ROUNDUP - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow, with hardly enough slaughter steer or heifer sales confirmed for a market test, few sales $1.00 per cwt lower than Wednesday, USDA said. Inquiry moderate, demand light.
Slaughter Steers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1325 lbs 64.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1125 lbs 64.00.
Confirmed - 2,000 Last week - none Last year - 100

Sales confirmed on 900 slaughter steers and 1,100 slaughter heifers Friday. Last week's confirmed sales 70,200 head including 41,200 head or about 59 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
